expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'Extend' mode based on the path to an existing server directory
Agent starts at Phase 3 (Implement) since the server already exists
Agent loads references/fastmcp-v3-api.md and references/tool-design.md for implementation guidance
Agent implements tools using Annotated[type, Field(description=...)] on every parameter
Agent includes verbose 3-5 sentence docstrings (WHAT, WHEN, WHEN NOT, RETURNS) on every tool
Agent sets annotations dict with at minimum readOnlyHint on every tool
Agent uses ToolError for expected failures, never print() or stdout writes
Agent writes tests using in-memory Client(mcp) per Phase 4 patterns
